alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 1:58PM MST until January 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
